ygData.subject: Re: Bards on test server?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have often thought Test would be a very interesting place to play, since it s usually very empty. Did you notice the new bard songs on any vendors?
ygData.messageBody:
Rokenn Swiftsong wrote:

> From: Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...>
>
> Over the weekend I started a Bard on the test server. I have to say the
> wide open spaces are nice, zoned into West Karana and I was the only one
> there :) The highest level Bard I have seen (via /w bard all) has been 18th
> level. Anyone else out there playing a Bard on Test? Would be nice to have
> a partner, I am currently 5th level and in the Qeynos area.

I have often thought Test would be a very interesting place to play, since it's
usually very empty.

Did you notice the "new bard songs" on any vendors?

Jyzan
